thread.title: Garrett Puyau
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Garrett Puyau

author: Garrett Puyau
title: Garrett Puyau
text: Was having problems when trying to start my car and during moving tests. Called in to report the issue. Spoke with Britney Justice. She was incredibly helpful. She informed that it was most likely a training issue. She walked me through the process three times and made sure I was comfortable with it before we ended the call. She was great! I feel like the there should be an easier way to use the unit though.
